text: A partnership may be automatically dissolved due to the following factors except________
explanation:
Dissolution of partnership refers to the termination of a partnership, thereby bringing the partnership to an end. Partnerships automatically dissolve if any partner dies or becomes bankrupt unless otherwise agreed.
The partnership may automatically be dissolved due to the following reasons:
Due to the death of the partner.Due to the admission of a new partner.Due to the retirement of a partner.Due to the bankruptcy of a partner.Due to the expiry of the partnership period, if the partnership is for a particular period.

text: One of the disadvantages of Sole Proprietorship is__________
explanation: The lack specialization because the owner is personally involved in every section of the business.

text: In the formation of a united liability company, the following documents are prepared except_______
explanation: A prospectus is an invitation to the public to purchase shares or debentures. It is most often issued by public limited companies.

text: The process of winding up or bringing a company to an end is________
explanation: Dissolution is the voluntary legal closure of a business when it has completed the business for which it was created.

text:
The following is a summary of the asset and liabilities of Ojo trading company as at 31st December, 2018



Initial Capital
5000


Net Profit
1000


Furniture
2000


Equipment
2900


Debtors
100


Stock
1000


Bank
500



 
From the above, calculate Current liabilities
explanation: From accounting equation;Assets = Capital + liabilitiesTherefore, liabilities = Assets - CapitalLiabilities = (4900 + 1600) - (500 + 1000) = 6500 - 6000⇒ ₦600

text: In a law of contract, what is given in exchange for a promise to perform is_____
explanation: Consideration is one of the valid element of a contract. It is the price for which a promise is bought.

text: In Nigeria, it is mandatory for all business enterprises to be registered with the________
explanation: All businesses must be registered with the Corporate Affairs Commission and a certificate of incorporation will be issued to any business incorporated.

text: All but one does not provide an Indirect Service?
explanation:
Indirect services are services rendered to the general public but they are not paid by the members of the public directly. The government will pay them from taxes and levies paid by the public.
The services of family doctors are part of direct services because they offer medical aid directly to the families that request it and are also paid by the clients.

text: Examples of Commercial occupation are all except___________
explanation: Commercial occupation are those activities involved in the distribution and exchange of goods and services.

text: All but one is not an output devices?
explanation: An output device is a device that can use to receive processed information from the computer system through either voice or hard-copy.

text: A self-contained chunk of code with principal aim to replies preferably undetected and to copy itself into the computer's memory and the computer's hard-disk is_________
explanation: A virus usually interferes with operating system, corrupts program and data files when the virus is on computer memory.

text: The risks that can be forecast and measured is termed___________
explanation: Insurable risks are the type of risks that is possible to collect, calculate and estimate the likely future losses.

text: The type of insurance policy that is compulsory in International trade so that all goods passing through the sea must be covered is considered to be________

options.A: The type of insurance policy that is compulsory in International trade so that all goods passing through the sea must be covered is considered to be

explanation: Marine Insurance covers losses or liabilities relating to ship and their cargnes or liabilities relating to ship and against the dangers or perils of the sea.

text: Thee major aim of consumer orientation is_________
explanation: Consumer orientation is the concept of marketing which begins and ends with the needs and wants of the consumers rather than that of the organisation.

text: The policy used when contracts are awarded as a result of tender is________
explanation: Bid pricing is used mostly in government contracts. If the object is to obtain the contract, cost will be considered mainly to determine the level of Minimum Price.

text: One of these is not a major in the production process?
explanation: It should be noted that production is said to be complete when goods and services produced get to the final users or consumers. The production process involves: Producers, distributors and consumers.

text: Examples of consumer goods include all except________
explanation: Consumer goods are goods and services that can satisfy the consumer's immediate needs. These goods do not require further process of production for their use by the consumers.

text: The most important resources of business is_______
explanation: Human resources is the most important resources because it plans, controls, organises and co-ordinates all other resources to achieve maximum efficiency.

text: A business environment that take into consideration the beliefs, attitudes, needs, values and attitudes of the people is_________
explanation: The cultural environment look into lifestyles of the people and the attitudes of the people.

text: An example of vertical integration is___________
explanation: Trust is an amalgation of different competing firms in different lines of business under a single management. It is vertically integrated in nature.

text: A company which another company is a member and control the board of directors or hold more than half of its equity is termed_______
explanation: A parent company is a single company that has a controlling interest in another company or companies. It owns and controls more than 50% of the outstanding voting shares of another company.

text: The theory of International trade is based on_________
explanation: International trade is based on the principle of comparative cost advantage that was propounded by David Ricardo in the 19th century.

text: A fall in the value of a country's currency vis-a-vis other currencies is known as__________
explanation: Devaluation is the lowering of the exchange value of a country's currency against other currencies. This makes import to be expensive and import to be more attractive.

text: A market is said to be bullish if_________

options.A: There is a fail in prices of Securities
options.B: There is a rise in prices of Securities
options.C: There is a rise above the offer prices
options.D: The speculator fails to deliver stock to the buyer

explanation: A market is said to be bullish if it is keen to buy. It is associated with the Bull who wait for a time of general rise in prices of securities.

text: One of these is not a factor affecting prices of securities?

options.A: The Forces of demand and supply

explanation: Securities are investments which are traded in the stock exchange in order to yield income.

text: A commission charged on postal order is__________
explanation: Poundage is a commission paid or charged on postal order. The sender fills the name of the person to be paid and can only be cashed by him.

text: A terms of payment in which the buyer pays cash immediately for goods bought before he takes them away is called____
explanation: A spot price is the price that is the current price and at which the instant delivery takes place. Spot payment or price is the same as the market price.

text: A cheque that is payable to whoever presents it is known as______
explanation: Bearer cheque is payable to the bearer i.e whoever presents it. It is cashed over the counter without having to be endorsed by the person presenting it.

text: A two-way process which involves sending and receiving of messages is referred to as__________
explanation: Communication is the process of exchange or transmission of meaningful information, feelings, opinions and ideas from one person to another. It is a two-way process which involve the source (sender) an the receiver.

text: The scope of commerce is limited to________
explanation: Commerce scop embraces trade and aids to trade.

text: All but one is not a demerit of advertising?
explanation: Advertising increases the profitability of an organisation.

text: Advantages of pipeline transport include all except_______
explanation: Pipe line transportation can be prone to leakages and authorised tapping by the people, as is the case in the Niger Delta.

text: The factors to be considered in setting up retail trade include all except_____
explanation: In setting up a retail trade, age is not a factor to be considered.

text: A responsibility to control environmental pollution is the responsibility of____
explanation: A business has a responsibility to control environmental pollution e.g water, land, sound and air pollution arising from their operations.

text: The following development of money have therefore been the use of, except______
explanation: Abacus is one of the counting devices used in the olden days. It does not serve as money.

text: Tourism involving residents of the given country travelling only within this country is called__________
explanation: Domestic Tourism, Involving residents of the given country travelling only within this country.

text: The headquarters of Niger Basin Commission is located at________
explanation: The NBC was established in Oct 1963 and the headquater of the commission is located in Niamey, Niger Republic.

text: A document which entitles its holder to the gods named on it, which is stored in a specific warehouse is called________
explanation: A warrant allows the goods to be released when duties have een paid and the authority concerned issue out warehouse warrant for it.

text: The difference between Articles of association and memorandum of Association is that the latter deals

options.A: with the Internal working relationship of the company and its members
options.B: with the powers and relationships of the company with outsiders
options.C: The method of issue, transfer and future of the company's shares
options.D: The rights and responsibilities of shareholders

explanation: Memorandum of Association contains what is generally called the "external" rules of the company. They refer to the objectives of the company and hold it intends to interact with the public.

text: All except one is not a corporation and boards at the federal level
explanation: Manufacturing Association of Nigeria is a trade association i.e Associations of Manufacturers.

text: The basic characteristics of co-operative society include all except one

options.B: It follows the principle of one man
options.D: Extra capital is raised through loan

explanation: Members in the management committees of Co-operative societies often lack business experience and expertise.

text: The basic characteristics of co-operative society include all except one

options.B: It follows the principle of one man
options.D: Extra capital is raised through loan

explanation:
Basic features of a cooperative society
Voluntary AssociationOpen MembershipService MotiveState ControlDemocratic ManagementSeparate Legal EntityDistribution of Surplus

text: Which of the limited liability companies have a limit of fifty members and do not issues their shares to the public
explanation: A private limited liability company is a profit making business with few shareholders and no open market for its shares. The minimum number of shareholders is two and the maximum number is fifty.

text: Gross profit
explanation: Gross profit = Sales - Cost of goods soldCost of goods sold = Opening + Purchases - Closing stock = 1000 + 7000 - 3000⇒ 6000Therefore, Gp = 8000 - 6000 = 3000

text: Net profit
explanation: Net profit = Gross profit - Expenses3000 - 1400 = 1600

text: Percentage of net profit to turnover
explanation: click here

text: An offer extended to several people at once is called
explanation: An invitation to treat is extended to several people at once. It is different from an offer e.g Goods displayed in a shelve.

text: A counter offer is an offer that is

options.D: extended to several people at once

explanation: A counter offer is an offer that is different from the original offer e.g Mr A said to Mr B, I will sell you the hat for ₦100 but Mr B replied, I will buy it for ₦80 is an example of a counter offer.

text: Services are made up of
explanation: Services are made up of direct services and indirect services.

text: The assembling of Manufactured products into forms usable by humans is classified as
explanation: Construction occupation is the assembling of manufactured products into forms e.g The building of houses is done by assembling bricks, tiles, door frames, window, frames, ceiling boards e.t.c

text: Computer that process data in the form of values is
explanation: Analog computers are those computers that are similar to use for measuring instruments such as Thermometer, Voltmeter i.e measured in value and scale.

text: A memory that can be read and write and is volatile is known as
explanation: Random Access Memory (RAM) are the most widely used primary storage medium. It can both sensed (read) and changed (written).

text: You have just bought a new car. What Insurance policy will you take to cover it?
explanation: Accident Insurance provides for compensation against injuries or hazards which may be due to a person or group of persons. It covers motor vehicle insurance as well.

text: A document that embody the conditions and exceptions attached to the contract is
explanation: The policy is the document containing full particulars of the Insured and the Subject matter of the Insurance.

text: The communication aspect of the marketing mix is
explanation: Promotion mix deals with how the business enterprise informs the consumer about the existence and the qualities of its products.

text: Any information about a manufacturer or his product that appears in any medium on a non-paid basis is known as
explanation: Publicity is one of the forms of promotion. Publicity attracts an audience which sees or hears commercial messages paid for by eager advertisers.

text: All activities that contribute towards making goods and services available to the people are
explanation: People are always producing goods and services. Production activities go on in all parts of the world.

text: Which of these is not a merit of division of labour

options.B: brings about an element of automation
options.C: Training in new jobs is facilitated
options.D: Creates monotony in the work force

explanation: Monotony of work is a demerit of division of labour because workers engages in the same tasks day-in and day out, after some time, he gets bored.

text: Which of these is not a merit of division of labour

options.B: brings about an element of automation
options.C: Training in new jobs is facilitated

explanation: Monotony of work is a demerit of division of labour because workers engages in the same tasks day-in and day out, after some time, he gets bored.

text: The function of management that establish objectives for the organization and trying to determine the best ways to accomplish them
explanation: Planning is the most important and precedes the other functions of management. It involves setting policies and procedures.

text: The provision of qualified managerial and other skilled personnel for an enterprise is called
explanation: Staffing is the process of organising human resources in such a way that the organisation has the right people in the right place at the right time.

text: A number of shipping lines operating on a certain route, which agree on a common policy regarding the conditions under which goods are to be carried
explanation: Conference is an international example of cartel which various shipping conferences operates.

text: The difference between a chamber of commerce and a trade association is that the former

options.A: is not restricted to a particular industry
options.B: is a branch of trade that sells product
options.C: consists of members engaged in the same trade
options.D: are association of individuals or firms

explanation: A chamber of commerce is a voluntary association of business executives, tradesmen, entrepreneurs and others in a city, town or country.

text: Which of these is a document used in International trade?
explanation: Invoice is one of the six main documents sent to the importer. The invoice will state in detail the nature, quality, quantity and price of the goods making up the consignment.

text: All but one is not a barriers to foreign trade
explanation: Trade Fair is a form of Sales Promotion.

text: The difference between the buying price and the selling price of a share is referred to as
explanation: The buying price of a share is the lower price and the selling price is the higher price. The difference between the two gives what is called Jobber's turn.

text: A bear market is said to be in existence in a period of
explanation: Slump is associated with the bears. A bear market is said to be in the period of stump with an uncertain economic trend.

text:
Use the following information to answer this question.
Oladosu Bookshop
54, Ahmadu Bello Way
Kaduna
P.O.BOOX 336
6 January 1989
Olu Stationery ltd
17, Kakawa Street
Lagos

Dear Sir,
We require 200 pieces of 0.8mm fountain pens and 1000 pieces of plain single line 21cm × 18cm exercise books.

Please give us quotes for the respective articles for immediate delivery and a statement of your terms of trade.

Yours Faithfully
Manager.

The above represents?
explanation: Letters of Inquiry is a document written by a buyer to the firm or organization asking for such information as the availability of the product, the price, sample, terms of trade and any other relevant information.

text:
Use the following information to answer this question.
Oladosu Bookshop
54, Ahmadu Bello Way
Kaduna
P.O.BOOX 336
6 January 1989
Olu Stationery ltd
17, Kakawa Street
Lagos

Dear Sir,
We require 200 pieces of 0.8mm fountain pens and 1000 pieces of plain single line 21cm × 18cm exercise books.

Please give us quotes for the respective articles for immediate delivery and a statement of your terms of trade.

Yours Faithfully
Manager.
From the question above, the document the firm or organization will send to the buyer is
explanation: A quotation is a statement of the current price and terms of trade of a product or service. Usually a quotation is an answer to an inquiry.

text: First Bank of Nigeria is an example of
explanation: Commercial banks are banks that accept deposit from the public e.g Ecobank, GTBank e.t.c

text: An abridged message sent at express speed to reach its destination faster than the airmail letters is known as
explanation: Telegram can be sent and delivered at any time of the day. Charges are made according to the number of words contained therein.

text: Commerce brings about all except one

options.B: Improvement in the standard of living

explanation: Commerce function as employment opportunities, International co-operation, Improvement in the standard of living and Infrastructural development.

text: Booklets containing a range of products, their uses and prices are called
explanation: Catalogue is a type of advertisement ideal for manufacturers in other countries or towns. It enables consumers to know about such products and to order or request for them.

text: All harbours, docks and waterways of Nigeria are looked after by a public corporation called the
explanation: The NPA was established in 1955 to provides facilities for water traffic movement and controls pollution in rivers and ports.

text: What is NPA?
explanation: The NPA was established in 1955 to provides facilities for water traffic movement and controls pollution in rivers and ports.

text: One of these is not part of small-scale retailers
explanation: Supermarkets is an example of large scale retailers.

text: The Sole aim of government owned business is to
explanation: Government owned business are established to provide services to the members of the public but for an individual, the aim is to make profit.

text:
Which function of money is described in the following statement?
It serves as a medium through which business transactions are carried out
explanation: Since money can be stored, it can accumulated to pay debts and can serve as a medium by which business transactions on credit can be settled.

text: Someone traveling abroad for at least "twenty - four hours" and a maximum stay of six months is known as
explanation: Tourism is the temporary, short-term movement of people to destinations outside the places where they live and work.

text: An International organisation that influence and fix the price of oil in the International markets is
explanation: Organisation of the petroleum exporting countries (OPEC) is a cartel organisation that ensure efficient and regular supply of petroleum & ensuring the stabilization of prices in International oil markets.
